page.title: 09DARRINGTON FEAST AND FAYRE
page.content: Our band was the only jazz band at the {Darrington Feast and Fayre on Saturday {13th.July 1985.}We marched from the Darrington Hotel to the field opposite Darrington Church where we did a display for visitors to the Fayre. When we weren't performing we went round the stalls and some of us took part in the races.{Once the Fayre was {for villagers only but nowadays there {are many visitors and many more {attractions}including old-fashioned cars,photography,model horse-drawn carriages,a B.M.X. display and a fairground organ.Round the edge of the field were stalls with jumble sales, games and items such as teddy-bears and pottery for sale.It is a tradition for the villagers to dress in old fashioned clothes.While we were there we visited the church and sang songs with the vicar.
